key_risks: Economic sensitivity tied to the U.S. housing market and interest rates
Supply chain disruptions impacting material availability
Intense competition in the insulation and building products market
controversies: Multiple OSHA violations with fines exceeding $16,000
Ongoing labor lawsuits related to wage and hour compliance
Employee reviews indicating potential internal ethical issues
environmental_issues: Dependence on insulation materials with high recycled content
Need to align with evolving environmental regulations
social_issues: Labor disputes and wage compliance issues
governance_issues: Potential gaps in enforcing Human Rights Policy and Supplier Code of Conduct
Reputational risks from legal and safety violations
